solution_line_template: On the second day, the snail kite ate {snails_day1} + {daily_increase} = <<{snails_day1}+{daily_increase}={snails_day2}>>{snails_day2} apple snails.
On the third day, the snail kite ate {snails_day2} + {daily_increase} = <<{snails_day2}+{daily_increase}={snails_day3}>>{snails_day3} apple snails.
On the fourth day, the snail kite ate {snails_day3} + {daily_increase} = <<{snails_day3}+{daily_increase}={snails_day4}>>{snails_day4} apple snails.
On the fifth day, the snail kite ate {snails_day4} + {daily_increase} = <<{snails_day4}+{daily_increase}={snails_day5}>>{snails_day5} apple snails.

The snail kite ate a total of {snails_day1} + {snails_day2} + {snails_day3} + {snails_day4} + {snails_day5} = <<{snails_day1}+{snails_day2}+{snails_day3}+{snails_day4}+{snails_day5}={total_snails}>>{total_snails} apple snails in 5
